name: Userstyles - Dark 2018
description: Makes Userstyles.org into a dark theme, so it doesn't murder your eyes.

user.name: Gibbu
user.about: About me: I like to mostly create dark themes to make it easier for your eyes, but I do like to change it up from time to time. I also like to try and make my themes customizable, so you can change the look and feels of the theme. Social stuff: My Website My YouTube My Twitter My Twitch

additional_info:
V2.0.1 (November 1st, 2018): ► Fixed search bar. V2.0 (September 7th, 2018): ► Fixed for new update. V1.9 (September 7th, 2018): ► Fixed/Themed your own profile. V1.8.1 (July 5th, 2018): ► Removed ads. V1.8 (June 18th, 2018): ► Changed some things with "Left side navigation" setting. ► Fixed left navigation borders. └ This means "Google, YouTube, Facebook ect". V1.7 (June 18th, 2018): ► Fixed long style card for "Increase Styles Displayed" under Customize Settings. ► Fixes for "Increase Styles Displayed" for those under 1600x900 resolution. ► Added an option to move the navigation to the left of the screen. └ This frees up space for "Increase Styles Displayed" so if you're on a 1080p display you don't need to scroll. V1.6 (June 14th, 2018): ► Fixed "Customize Settings" width. ► Add an option that allows you to see more themes within a smaller area. └ Making see styles easier to see. ► Able to remove Android on the nav bar. V1.5 (June 7th, 2018): ► Removed add divs from styles lists. ► Fixed site header ("Youtube Themes & Skins") ► Fixes to long card design. V1.4 (May 23rd, 2018): ► Fixed Android coming soon page. ► Simplified Android coming soon button on nav bar to take up less space. ► Fixed borders of code tags ► Change search bar on nav. ► Minor changes to forums. ► Added an option to invert profile and editor iframes. This may result in inaccurate colours. └ I moved the last update into an option. So if you want a dark theme but have inaccurate colours you can if you want. V1.3.1 (May 18th, 2018): ► Fixed edit theme and own profile iframes. (Cheers J0k3r!) V1.3 (March 9th, 2018): ► Fixed new "Customize Settings" button. ► Adjustments to submitting a review for themes. ► Fixes to Forums page. V1.2.2 (February 5th, 2017): ► Fixes to GREY theme. ► Adjustments to "Advanced Style Settings" and "Show CSS Code". V1.2.1 (September 2nd, 2017): ► Fixes to forums.
Changed: Search box, comment box, New discussion button and inverted a few option buttons. V1.2 (August 17th, 2017): ► Fixes to search. ► Fixes to Forums. ► A grey scheme is available.
I made a grey scheme, for those who didn't like being too dark. Twitter YouTube Twitch Website
